reference.shortdesc: The filepath element indicates the name of a referenced file, system path, or both.

section.title: Usage information
section.draft-comment: Conref to library topic needed here
section.p: This element is part of the DITA software domain, a special set of DITA elements designed to document software tasks, concepts and reference information.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: Uncompress the gbbrsh.gz file to the /usr directory. Ensure that the /usr/tools/data.cfg path is listed in the execution path system variable.
